answers.answer: The prompt does not need to follow grammatical rules in order to produce quality results.
The prompt must follow all grammatical rules in order to produce quality results.
The prompt must be in English in order to produce quality results.
The prompt must follow the rules of the Python language in order to produce quality results.

source.guidance: One of the benefits of a model like GPT-3 is that it does not require prompts to conform to a strict set of standards. You can write prompts with capitalization and punctuation mistakes. You do not need to write the prompt in English. Nor do you need to write in a special syntax (like Python). The GPT-3 model understands natural language, even if it is poorly written.
source.instructions: **Select the ++best++ description of the prompt so that the GPT-3 model produces quality results.**
source.learningObjectives: SWBAT describe a prompt for the GPT-3 model
source.name: gpt-3
